attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please remove the title of Right Honourable from Members of Parliament.
Do not give them this title back until they have earned the right to it by performing the duties expected of them by the electorate.
The whole country is highly aware that MP's prime interests are in serving themselves and feeding at the expenses trough. 
They should not be reffered to as Right Honourable until they deserve that title.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
